title: Inadvertent Lapse of OMB Control Number 1506-0009 and subsequent request for reinstatement in 2018

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Inadvertent Lapse of OMB Control Number 1506-0009 and subsequent request for reinstatement in 2018
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All documentation, correspondence, memoranda, reports, emails, notices, or other relevant materials related to FinCEN's failure to renew in a timely manner OMB Control Number 1506-0009 during the year 2018 and the subsequent request for reinstatement (tracked under ICR Ref No. 201810-1506-001). This includes but is not limited to:

1. Any internal communications discussing the expiration of OMB Control Number 1506-0009 and the Request. 
2. Any external communications with the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) regarding the Request  process.
3. Any analysis or assessments conducted regarding the impact of the expired control number on FinCEN's operations or regulatory obligations.
4. Any remedial actions or analyses taken or proposed to address the failure to renew the control number.

Please include all documents regardless of format, including electronic records, written correspondence, and any other relevant materials. If certain records are exempt from disclosure under FOIA, please provide a detailed explanation for each exemption claimed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Nicholas Lee
